title: Diana's Dreams
description: Surrounded by the wizards, vampires and werewolves, Diana is kidnapped by a lunatic and forced to endure cruel tortures while locked away in his basement. While her husband and former lover search for her, the madman responsible for her imprisonment utilizes dark magic, and even darker allies, to keep her hidden. How long can she survive while being tormented by an obsessed lunatic?
author: Brenda Coffman
